name: fishnet
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
made from a type of material that looks like net: fishnet stockings She was wearing black fishnet stockings.fishnet tights She threw away an entire bag of torn fishnet tights.

You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
Stockings, tights & socks
[ U ] a type of material that looks like net: Flowers and fishnet are a strange combination. Choose natural-coloured stockings or tights, but avoid fishnet or seams.

fishnets
[ plural ] tights or stockings made of a material that looks like net: She was wearing cowboy boots and white fishnets.
